definition: woven mat/seat/banquet/place in a democratic assembly/classifier for banquets, conversations etc

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: This mat has to be hammered down at the edges.
sentences.chinese: 必須把這張席子的邊釘上。

sentences.english: The laborers home from their fields spread their mats in the courtyards.
sentences.chinese: 勞動的人們從田間歸來，把席子展鋪在院子裏。

sentences.english: This mat is too big for the room, it laps over at the edges.
sentences.chinese: 這張席子放在屋裏太大，四邊都折了起來。

sentences.english: Not only can ivory be made into mats, but feathers have also been woven into beautiful garments.
sentences.chinese: 不僅只有象牙能做成席子，羽毛也能做成美麗的外衣。

sentences.english: Yes, I have been busy emptying the packing boxes and cleaning up the mats.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我一直在忙着清空包裝箱，清洗席子。

sentences.english: The child toddled along quite nicely until he fell over the mat.
sentences.chinese: 席子上摔倒之前，蹣跚學步走得滿像樣的。

sentences.english: The cat catches a fat rat and scatters the others under the mat.
sentences.chinese: 貓抓了一隻肥鼠並驅散了席子下面的其它老鼠。

sentences.english: Rice stalks are made into baskets, mats and shoes.
sentences.chinese: 稻梗被製成籃子，席子和鞋。

sentences.english: We must glue the mat down at the edges to stop it curling.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須用膠把席子的邊粘住，免得卷邊。

sentences.english: The earth mat is the annual imperial demo heave son exam decorate.
sentences.chinese: 地上的席子是一年一度的科舉演示舉子考試佈置。

sentences.english: Confusion is the welcome mat at the door of creativity.
sentences.chinese: 混亂是創意之門受歡迎的席子。

definition: summer sleeping mat (e.g. of woven split bamboo)/CL:張|张[zhang1],領|领[ling3]
thin bamboo strips used for basket weaving
kang (a heatable brick bed)/to bake/to dry by the heat of a fire
